com.yantra.ycp.japi

Interface SCICustomDataCompressor


  • public interface SCICustomDataCompressor
    Implement this interface to provide custom compression for database columns.

    The implementation must be thread-safe, as the same instance may be shared by multiple threads.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.OutputStream compress(java.lang.String tableName, java.lang.String columnName, boolean isTextData, java.io.OutputStream outStream)
      Returns an OutputStream to which the uncompressed data will be written.
      java.io.InputStream decompress(java.lang.String tableName, java.lang.String columnName, boolean isTextData, java.io.InputStream inStream)
      Returns an InputStream from which the uncompressed data can be read.
      boolean useDefaultBinaryCoding()
      Flag to indicate whether this class does its own binary-to-string encoding.

    • Method Detail

      • useDefaultBinaryCoding

        boolean useDefaultBinaryCoding()
        Flag to indicate whether this class does its own binary-to-string encoding. true to use the built-in encoding, false if this class implements its own version. Note that if this method returns true, then the isTextData argument to the compress and decompress methods will always be false.

      • compress

        java.io.OutputStream compress(java.lang.String tableName,
                              java.lang.String columnName,
                              boolean isTextData,
                              java.io.OutputStream outStream)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Returns an OutputStream to which the uncompressed data will be written.

        It should internally send the compressed data to the given outStream. tableName Name of the table that will store the data columnName Name of the column that will store the data isTextData If true, the final output is destined for a character-based field, so any binary data must be encoded into valid characters (for example by Base64-encoding it). Note if useDefaultBinaryCoding returns true, then this parameter will always be passed as false. outStream Delegate output stream that the returned output stream should write to. OutputStream that compresses data and passes it to the given outStream.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • decompress

        java.io.InputStream decompress(java.lang.String tableName,
                               java.lang.String columnName,
                               boolean isTextData,
                               java.io.InputStream inStream)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Returns an InputStream from which the uncompressed data can be read.

        The input data stream is positioned at the start of the compressed data (after header information). tableName Name of the table that the data comes from columnName Name of the column that the data comes from isTextData If true, the incoming Stream is text data. Note if useDefaultBinaryCoding returns true, then this parameter will always be passed as false. inStream InputStream that points to the compressed data InputStream from which the uncompressed data can be read.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
